[b][color=white]Warning Forgiveness[/color][/b]
HF has introduced another beneficial feature that can benefit members to get relieved of their warning levels. Presently, a user can take a quiz and can withdraw its warning level. But the questionnaire is available once per warning type per member. Read more about this feature in its dedicated thread. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6073069]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Icon Library Upgrade[/color][/b]
HF has changed its icon pack. Now, you'll see slight changes in the icons. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6073000]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Award Lotteries[/color][/b]
Now users can get awards in lotteries. This works same as Bytes lottery. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075066]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]User News[/color][/b]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4357897][color=#ffffff][b]AYMG[/b][/color][/url] has attained the great thinker award! Great job with those convo's suggestions!
[/list]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://i.imgur.com/h7xXLg2.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6071094][color=#FFFFFF]Quick Love Analytics[/color][/url] - Xerotic
A brand new stat has been added to the user analytics feature. You can now see how many "Quick Love's" you have been given in the last 28 days. This add-on to the feature has made the user analytics look a little bit fuller. Rumors are going around that there will be more stats added to the analytics, but only time will tell since everyone does not use it.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6073739][color=#FFFFFF]Kim Jong Un makes first public appearance in 20 days[/color][/url] - maryous
Last week we mentioned that the leader of North Korean, Kim Jong Un, was rumored to be dead, but after people not seeing him for 20 days straight, he has made an appearance cutting a ribbon at the opening of a fertilizer factory. The leader wasn't seen since April 11th because of speculation about his health. Some media sources have asked Kim about what was going on, and he stated he didn't really want to talk about what happened.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6070605][color=#FFFFFF]Why covid-19 affects men more than women[/color][/url] - Ocarina
A recent study claims to have found that males are more at risk to the coronavirus than females. This is due to testicles harboring the coronavirus, and it gives a sanctuary from the immune system, which allows the infection to persist for longer in males. From the statistics of the virus, males are more affected by the virus in general, but this could be the main reason why more males are getting the infection than females.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6074468][color=#FFFFFF]Favourite Pokemon[/color][/url] - IPIKIN
Pokemon, some of us grew up with it and some of us are still just learning or even hearing about it. But IPIKIN is talking about what your favorite Pokémon is and why. This is not going to be as easy as it once was when only the first-gen of Pokémon were out since back then you didn't have so many people to choose from. IPIKIN has stated that their favorite Pokémon is Charizard because it is the most expensive card they know of. What is yours?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6072147][color=#FFFFFF]My Quest for the Pizza Award; A Diary[/color][/url] - Scooby
The member currently known as Scooby has set themselves a mission to obtain the pizza award, They are doing this by making a thread as a diary and so far it's going well. We can't say he will obtain the award like this but we sure do enjoy the thread. Scooby has stated they eat a large amount of pizza, and because of that, they are going after the award.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6074584][color=#FFFFFF]May the Fourth be with you! Jedi Omni will save us all![/color][/url] - AYMG
The 4th of May has just passed, and AYMG has shared a lovely picture of Omniscient in his garden, but with a little lightsaber. Since it was star wars day, we thought we would add this to the news because it looks funny, and we all love a good little laugh. Plus, you can see Omniscient for the first time, maybe.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6074270][color=#FFFFFF]What's your Quarantine Goals?[/color][/url] - flavoral
Flavoral is back in the news at long last with a thread talking about what you plan to achieve within your time stuck in quarantine. Many members have come to the thread with some plans but some have got inspired by the thread to do something since they never planned to do anything while in the lockdown and the ideas people have come up with are just the best. Make sure you go and check this thread out as its really worth the read.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6074362][color=#FFFFFF]$20 Giveaway Raffle + x2 $5 Runner-Ups [OPEN TO ALL][/color][/url] - zSerity
A member currently known as zSerity is giving people a chance to win $20. Everyone can enter than means you don't have to have upgraded your account. Plus if you don't win the $20, you could win $5 as a runner up prize! Make sure you get your chance to win some easy money by entering zSerity's giveaway.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6072015][color=#FFFFFF][ALL MEMBERS] MULTIPLE PRIZES & ENTRIES - *$15 BTC* | *$5 BTC* | *$5 PP* [$$ CONTEST][/color][/url] - Eco Luko
Eco Luko Is giving away some bitcoin and even some PayPal money to the lucky winners of their giveaway. To enter, all you have to do is post a random fact about your life that the giveaway host may find exciting and boom, you are in for a chance at winning. Good luck!
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/bEObSqt.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Model S Long Range Update[/color][/b]
The Environmental Protection Agency says that Elon Musk recently lied about an earnings call about the EPA's Tesla Model S test. Now, the Model S Long Range is rated 348 miles until it needs to be completely recharged. Musk believed that it would be the first electric vehicle to have a 400-mile range, but the EPA test was short and reported that the Model S Long Range was suitable for 391-miles. Musk pointed out why the vehicle did not reach the distance it was supposed to have, "someone had left the keys in the vehicle and the door open overnight, causing the Model S to enter into a "waiting for driver" mode that depleted 2 percent of the vehicle's battery." The EPA refuted these allegations that no one left the keys in the vehicle and the door open overnight, and the test was carried out correctly.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2020/5/1/21244556/elon-musk-lie-epa-tesla-model-s-range-miles-mistake-door] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]iPhone SE 2020[/color][/b]
Apple recently launched the second version of the SE iPhone. This model will have a display size of 4.7 inches, 326 pixels per inch, the latest A13 Bionic chip, and a price range of between $400 and $550 depending on the storage space. This new budget phone from Apple took the crown of the greatest bang for your buck. Although it's an improved version of the iPhone 8, Apple played their cards right and knew they'd be able to catch their customers' attention with this refresh. Sacrifices had to be made for the price range, but they were clever about their sacrifices and put out a budget phone that's faster than any Android phone on the market. Google is also launching its Pixel 4a soon, so it may not be a bad idea to see how it compares if you're looking for a new phone.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.popularmechanics.com/technology/gadgets/a32292901/iphone-se-review-2020/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Uber Cracking Down[/color][/b]
Uber is taking new measures to ensure that their drivers and riders remain safe during these times of the outbreak of COVID-19. Uber will achieve this by implementing a new policy that will use new technology for drivers and riders to identify that they are wearing their masks. If it is discovered that a driver isn’t wearing a mask, they won't be able to accept requests from riders resulting in no income. “As countries reopen, Uber is focused on safety and proceeding with caution. Today, we continue to ask riders to stay home if they can, while shipping safety supplies to drivers who are providing essential trips. At the same time, our teams are preparing for the next phase of recovery, where we will all have a role to play.” This new requirement will only be accountable in certain markets when the policy gets pushed out.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/03/tech/uber-drivers-riders-face-masks/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://i.imgur.com/yvPPn5U.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Seitokai Yakuindomo Sequel Movie Releases Key Visual and Trailer![/color][/b]
A trailer was released for the upcoming comedy anime, Seitokai Yakuindomo's second movie. The movie is scheduled to release in Japan on July 10 and there are no public dates on when it will be released outside of Japan. Check out the trailer [url=https://youtu.be/SxRyCwcvBsA]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5ea94bc311040cf3177e099d/Seitokai-Yakuindomo-Sequel-Movie-Releases-Key-Visual-and-Trailer!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Comiket Organizes Red Cross Blood Donation Campaign[/color][/b]
Comiket is teaming up with the Japanese Red Cross Blood Drive. Due to COVID-19 canceling a majority of the events this year, Comiket is most likely going to be added to that list too. Those within the Comiket committee are encouraging those who are healthy to donate their blood to Red Cross Japan. You have some time, but if you are interested then you can sign up anytime between May 21 and June 30. However, the problem is that it is for Japanese residents only. Sorry! Those who donate over 400mL of blood will receive a free poster of their choice. If you are from Japan or currently there now and would like to see what posters you can get, check it out [url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-04-27/comiket-organizes-red-cross-blood-donation-campaign/.158961]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-04-27/comiket-organizes-red-cross-blood-donation-campaign/.158961]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Netflix Streams Dorohedoro Anime Outside Japan on May 28[/color][/b]
Netflix will be releasing the anime Dorohedoro to its services outside of Japan. Previously, the only way to watch the anime was on a Japanese Netflix account, where it premiered before the show was supposed to air tot the Japanese public or by illegally streaming it. The anime aired from January until March and most recently, the series released six extra episodes dubbed, "Ma no Omake (Magic Bonus)". [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-04-21/netflix-streams-dorohedoro-anime-outside-japan-on-may-28/.158822]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kyoto Animation's Studio 1 Building Demolition Completed[/color][/b]
Last year, an arsonist set fire to the Kyoto Animation studio located in Kyoto, Japan. The incident reported that 36 people were confirmed dead and 33 injured. The arsonist was found and put into custody by law enforcement. The person behind it was a 41-year-old man by the name of Shinji Aoba, who states, "I started the fire because my novel was stolen [by them].". The studio was built back in the early '80s and famous hits such as MMiss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid and The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya were created in this studio. Very recently, the rebuilding of the studio was complete. Additionally, the Japanese government will distribute 3,314,438,000 yen (about US$30 million) between the studio itself, families of those who lost loved ones, and those who were injured. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/today-demolition-work-on-kyoto-animation-s-studio-1-bu-1843127716]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crunchyroll Adds Dropkick on My Devil!! Dash Anime's 'Chapter Chitose' Episode[/color][/b]
"Jashin-chan Dropkick'" otherwise known as "Dropkick on My Devil!! Dash" is the second season in the Crunchyroll original series Jashin-chan Dropkick. The anime premiered this spring 2020 season on April 6. What made this release special was that Crunchyroll released all 11 episodes of the anime at once! Recently a special 12th episode of the show, "Jashin-chan Dropkick': Chitose-hen" which takes play in the "Chapter Chitose" arc in the manga has been released. We will be introduced to a new character by the name of Lierre (Rie-ru) who is voiced by a Chitose City native. Lierre is described as one of the head angels, which means her ranking is above Pekora, Poporon, and Pino. AnimeNewsNetwork states "The episode is funded by Chitose's hometown tax program, in which taxpayers can donate to city programs in exchange for tax breaks and other incentives. The story will deal with the process and incentives of the hometown tax program.". [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-04-29/crunchyroll-adds-dropkick-on-my-devil-dash-anime-chapter-chitose-episode/.159109]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Anime Scheduled For July, October Are Already Considering Delays[/color][/b]
Sponichi who is also known as Sports Nippon in Japan has recently said in an interview conducted by the anime news website, AnimeNewsNetwork (ANN), that the anime which will be airing during the summer and fall season of 2020 may have a chance of being postponed until a later date. It is not known for sure whether or not this COVID-19 epidemic will calm down by then, so with that being said keep in mind, you might not have a season filled with as much anime as you were expecting, just like how a majority of the anime this season are getting canceled.

Why consider the delays now? One of the hardest problems right now due to the virus is getting the voice acting done in time for it to be mastered and then matched to the animation it is going to be voiced over. The voice actors work in a group together in a room specifically for recording, so there are not any echos and you can ensure the utmost quality. Since everyone is to remain at home and only go out when needed, it's very hard to get everyone into one room and record the voices. Some voice actors will have a recording studio and their home which they can use, but this is not the case for everyone. Another thing that is being affected the most is the production itself. ANN states, "China and South Korea, which are dealing with their own COVID-related struggles.".[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-04-21/sponichi-anime-scheduled-for-july-october-are-already-considering-delays/.158804]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix Switch Game Heads West on May 15[/color][/b]
If you are a fan of rhythm games, then you are in for a special treat as Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix will be making its way to other countries outside of Japan this May 15. At the current time of this article, you can download the demo and play now! If you are familiar with the Hatsune Miku games on the PS4, then you are most likely familiar with how this game works. If you have not seen the Hatsune Mike games before or rhythm games for that matter, check out this trailer [url=https://youtu.be/IHPYsFgGLXw]here[/url].

The game was originally released in Japan at the start of the year, back in February. This game also marks the celebration of the 10th anniversary of the Hatsune Miku game series. You can purchase the base game if you wish, but if you are an ultimate fan, you will be able to purchase an extra DLC pack, called the "Mega Pack". The Mega Pack will include six new songs and the price will be $6.99. Altogether, the game will have over 101 songs (if you purchase the DLC). Additionally, you will be able to customize your Hatsune Miku character with 300 different costumes! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-04-21/hatsune-miku-project-diva-mega-mix-switch-game-heads-west-on-may-15/.158787]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Demon Slayer Ripoff Game Released In South Korea[/color][/b]
Just five days after its release, the Korean smartphone RPG game that goes by the name of "Gwisal-ui Geom" in English romanization announced that their application will be shutting down. The application was critiqued by players in Japan and Korea on how similar the character designs were to the popular anime, Demon Slayer. The game was launched on April 24 and the main focus of the game is to slay demons that killed his family, which is also similar to Tanjiro, the main character from Demon Slayer.

What makes this even more peculiar is that there were additional add-ons in the game you could purchase. Not only did they knowingly steal someone else's work, but they were looking to make a profit off it too.

The game developer, Tennine, was interviewed by a Korean game news website where they stated, "People only think that the two properties are similar because of the Japanese-style clothing and the basic".  The statement in their apology announcement did purposely left out any mentions of plagiarism, and instead of that there were problems with the game and it had to shut down. The game officially shut down on April 29. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/demon-slayer-ripoff-game-launches-in-south-korea-1843196157]>>source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://i.imgur.com/rwL371N.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]May 4, 2020 - May 10, 2020[/i]

[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"Finances, business ideas, and career goals can flourish this week because positive energies can contribute to your security and success. With the sun aligning with articulate Mercury in your money zone and making some excellent aspects over the week, this can be a time of opportunity, positive developments, and exciting deals.

Be careful on Thursday when the energies are more volatile and unpredictable. With a supermoon in Scorpio and your sector of business and shared assets, you could make an impulsive financial decision. And with thoughtful Mercury aligning with aquatic Neptune, there is also the potential for misunderstandings. If you need to close a deal or make an important commitment, check the fine print and keep the paperwork.

Still, your determination to reach a financial goal increases as the week gathers pace, and there’s a very good chance you’ll succeed even if it means moving out of your comfort zone."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"This is a week when you can thrive, because the focus on your sign, and particularly the sun’s link with Mercury in Taurus, can inspire you to plan ahead.

The tie between potent Pluto and upbeat Jupiter continues and may coincide with a plan that’s progressing through various stages. Ultimately, it will have a successful outcome, but you might need to reflect and review key aspects of it as you go along.

You can make significant progress over the days ahead as Mercury connects with dreamy Neptune, potent Pluto, and expansive Jupiter. Linking up with the right people can bring inspiration, while following your instincts can encourage you to take a leap of faith. Something big is brewing, and you fully intend to make the most of it.

Cautious Saturn, currently moving through your sector of goals and career, turns retrograde on Sunday and remains so until the end of September. It’s an opportunity to reflect on what you’d really like to accomplish over the long term."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"There seems to be a lot going on beneath the surface with the sun in a private and spiritual zone along with talkative Mercury and electric Uranus. At the same time, jovial Jupiter and powerful Pluto are in your psychological sector and stirring up deep-seated energies that could influence finances, relationships, and many other areas of life.

It wouldn’t be surprising if dreams became more vivid and you uncovered the answers to certain life issues while you sleep. When you wake, you may know exactly what to do next. All that’s left to do is follow through.

There’s a supermoon in Scorpio and your lifestyle sector on Thursday, so this can be an opportunity to step back and look at your schedule. Is it working for you? If not, this is your chance to let go of routines and even habits that might be affecting your productivity.

This week brings a chance for transformation if you’re willing to let go of the old and embrace the new."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"This can be an exciting week, with many good things in store for you. You might enjoy moving in new circles, connecting online with others who share your interests, and generally linking to those who are on your wavelength. Some of the friendships and associations you make could be especially positive and life changing.

On Thursday, the supermoon across your social axis may enhance emotions. If you’ve held back from telling someone how you feel, this lunar phase could see it all coming out into the open. Plus, one romance could gain in intensity with you two becoming an item.

Mercury in your sign makes some leading aspects that could see you getting along with certain people and eager to collaborate. Any decisions you make with a combination of instinct and logic will likely be the right ones.

As prudent Saturn will be retrograde in your sector of shared assets and business from Sunday until July 1, when it enters Capricorn, any pressure you’ve felt could ease a little."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"As the sun continues its journey through your career zone, the coming week encourages you to stand out from the crowd and showcase your best qualities. The sun’s merger with thoughtful Mercury on Monday could find you eagerly discussing a plan that turns out to be very lucrative.

However, the supermoon in your home zone on Thursday might inspire you to reflect on your work/life balance. If you don’t have enough time for your family or to relax, this could be highlighted, encouraging you to do something about it.

A project or business development might work out well for you if you’re willing to put in the effort. It just needs a sound strategy to succeed.

Perhaps the biggest news this week is that Saturn goes into reverse in your relationship sector, which could mean you’re less resistant to your partner and their ways and more likely to take things in stride."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"Whether you’re eager to get away from it all or want to start a course of study, this week could find you eager to get moving. The sun’s alignment with Mercury suggests that you’ll be in the planning and organizing stage, which can set you up to make a positive start.

The supermoon on Thursday could find you very excited about one plan that seems to shimmer more brightly than others. It might need a little more refinement, which you can do over this week with promising results.

You could also reach the conclusion of a project that has involved a lot of work. You might be about to enjoy a lucrative reward.

As articulate Mercury, your ruler, angles toward Pluto and Jupiter, it can set creative energies in motion, making this a good time to get started on a bold creative project.

Saturn turns retrograde in your lifestyle sector on Sunday, and this reveals that any pressure you’ve felt could begin to ease."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"If life seems more intense than usual, this could be due to the sun in your psychological zone. In this sector, it can stir up emotions or bring skeletons rattling out of the closet. And with Mercury aligning with the sun on Monday, the desire to talk to someone about this could grow stronger. In fact, this might not be such a bad idea because it could help you get to the heart of an issue that has been bothering you for some time.

Continuing this powerful theme, Thursday’s supermoon occurs in Scorpio, and it could bring up some issues around another taboo area: money. If there is something to discuss, this is the time when it might all come out into the open. Avoid impulsive purchases, though, because you might regret them further down the line.

This can also be a good week to discuss home projects, especially if they require an injection of cash. Talking with a financial adviser or bank can get the ball rolling."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"With a focus on your sector of relating, there’s an excellent opportunity to discuss matters with a view toward finding a way forward. The sun’s tie with logical Mercury encourages practical thinking and down-to-earth proposals. And if you can meet another halfway, so much the better.

And yet, with a supermoon in your sign on Thursday, there could be a potentially volatile quality about certain associations. If someone has been holding their feelings back, these emotions might now come out into the open, and you could be surprised by what’s revealed.

Articulate Mercury makes some leading aspects this week, so it could benefit you to keep the conversation going. Even if you’re experiencing difficulties with someone, a continued willingness to reach out could heal things quickly.

Do you need a break from home responsibilities? Saturn turns retrograde in your domestic sector this weekend, and any pressure you feel could begin to ease somewhat."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"There is a lot of activity in practical and earthy sectors of your chart, which can be a call to come to grips with everyday issues. The more organized you are, the easier it will be to deal with them. And with chatty Mercury aligning with the sun on Monday, this is a good time to create a plan.

Still, with restless Uranus in this zone for some time to come, you may resist too much micromanaging, preferring some freedom to make changes when desired. Even the most basic schedule can help you stay on track and accomplish your goals.

The supermoon in a more secluded sector on Thursday could cause some disruption, and because of this it would be best to simplify matters for a day or two. And if you can manage to get in a relaxing walk, so much the better.

Finally, with Mercury aligning with Jupiter, there is the potential for a lucrative opportunity to come your way."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"Do you need a chance to unwind? There’s an upbeat focus on your leisure sector, so this is your time to indulge in those activities you enjoy the most. And with electric Uranus also in this sector, the cosmos encourages you to experiment with options that pique your interest.

This can be an excellent time to learn a new skill, especially if it involves flexibility or dexterity. And if you take to it, it could form the basis of a side hustle that enhances your income.

There’s a potent supermoon in your social sector on Thursday, so emotions could reach a peak. If you’re falling in love, you could be very tempted to share your feelings, but consider the consequences. Would you regret it later? However, if a key relationship needs an injection of passion, this lunar phase can provide it.

Sobering Saturn rewinds in your money zone this weekend, so any delays or long-running issues may begin to show signs of improvement."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"If you’re eager to get your place in order, a positive blend of energies involving the sun and quicksilver Mercury could see you busy decluttering and creating more space. This is an opportunity to throw out what you no longer need and organize your belongings so you feel in control of your space. Doing so can have a positive effect on your energy and clarity.

Plus, with Mercury making leading aspects to both volcanic Pluto and expansive Jupiter over the coming days, some quiet reflection could allow powerful ideas to bubble up. Don’t dismiss these, because they could take your life in a new and profitable direction.

There’s a supermoon in Scorpio and the topmost sector of your chart on Thursday, so you’ll have the potential to shine if you act in a way that enhances your image.

And as cautious Saturn rewinds in your sign this weekend, you may feel less pressure on you to do more and be more."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"This can be a great time for moving ahead with online projects and marketing, networking, and generally staying in touch with the people who matter.

If you feel an urge to study or get a degree or certification, this is your chance to make a plan.

Talkative Mercury is forging some spectacular angles over the course of this week, so encounters could lead to exciting developments. You might be asked to take part in a team project that could be very good for you in more ways than one. And with the supermoon in your sector of fresh opportunities on Thursday, one idea could stand out from all the rest and be the making of you.

Your social life looks pleasantly busy and upbeat. There could be a chance of a sizzling romance or to make new friends in the near future.

As taskmaster Saturn rewinds in your spiritual sector over the weekend, it can be an opportunity to let go of an issue that has bugged you for far too long."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]
[hr]
[align=center]
[b][i][color=#ccffff]Remember to stay strong, be safe and know that we will get through these difficult times together! Blessed be everyone![/color][/i][/b][/align]

[color=transparent]         [/color]
